about.title: About me
about.description: I'm Ricardo Alves, a passionate and dedicated junior full-stack developer from Lisbon, enthusiastic about growing in the tech field. I'm available for freelance or contract opportunities.

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: Here are the skills I've acquired so far. I'm eager to apply them in projects that will help me solidify and master these abilities.

experience.title: My experience
experience.description: Currently looking for my first opportunities in the field. Help me get rid of these skeletons!

projects.title: My first Project
projects.description: This is my first project, a landing page created to apply the HTML and CSS skills from my course. It features a responsive design that adapts to various screen sizes, using Flexbox and media queries to ensure a smooth user experience.

projects.title: 2Wheels Adventure
projects.description: This is my second project, developed for the frontend part of my course at FLAG. It showcases an advanced use of React, with an emphasis on good HTML semantics and clean CSS styling. The project features dynamic components and a responsive layout.

projects.title: Adventure Parts
projects.description: This is my third project, a backend-focused e-commerce website built with PHP as part of my course at FLAG. It includes user authentication, a complete CMS area, and implements modern security practices to prevent SQL Injection, XSS, and CSRF attacks.

projects.title: My portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio, my fourth project created after completing a full-stack web development course, is designed to showcase my current work as well as upcoming projects. It also serves as a dynamic project in itself, evolving and improving over time as my skills grow and my expertise expands.
